title: Mobile Microlearning Strategies to Enhance Online Learning Effectiveness

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device operation skills and foundational language learning at the elementary level
context.additional_context: Provides content optimized for smartphone-based learning environments and establishes real-time feedback systems.

learning_goals: Learners can acquire five or more core language concepts per week using 10-minute microlearning content in mobile environments.
Learners can identify three or more major difficulties encountered during online learning and propose improvement strategies through formative assessments.
Learners develop strategies to enhance language learning effectiveness by 20% or more through peer feedback and expert video coaching.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
